text.text:
Autochess Heroes have Traits which are possibly used in other games
Instead of buying heroes to level them up and them occupying space, you
invest and grow their Experience. Instead of a single hero you upgrade
(auto gladiators) or many different ones that work independently (auto
chess) you have a team of heroes which work collectively as one You add
heroes to your team Pawn Knight Bishop Rook Ruler peao 1 torre 5 cavalo
bispo 3 rainha 9 Choose an Ascendant Lightsprite Rimesprite 1 Ability 4
Pawns 2 Knights 2 Bishops 2 Rooks Lightsprite Rimesprite Ascendant Aspects
- Tales - Love - Hate - Pawn Traits Light Rime Warrior Rogue Sorcerer
Shield Injury Poison Fury
